title: Ineligible duo partner
body: Today me and my friend were planning on duoing our placements last season i was gold 5 and he was silver 2 then i noticed that i couldnt even invite him cause he was an ineligible duo partner at first i thought riot was wanting to make the game more balance so i was ok with that then i saw a friend on my friendslist and he was eligible even tho last season he was silver 4-5 and just stayed there for the rest of the season?? rito pls

replies.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0QgvppdwF5w might solve ur problemo m8.... or not
